title: 1810Attorney General Ken Paxton: I'm suing Harris County for unlawfully directing over $1.3 million
content:
1810 Attorney General Ken Paxton: I'm suing Harris County for unlawfully directing over $1.3 million in taxpayer money to defend illegal aliens from deportation. We must stop the left-wing radicals who are robbing Texans to prevent illegals from being deported by the Trump Administration. posted 1 day ago by Mr_Rightside 67 comments award share download report block
